input: Submit a batch request to retrieve and update lock requests including event details and user status updates.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequestEventSpecifications?$select=EventCode,EventName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCardContractLockRequests/123456 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"UserStatusCode": "3"}


--request-separator--
